messages.subject: Re: BBC Radio 4
messages.msgSnippet: ... HE in Britain. ... still make ... HREF= http://www.bbc.co.uk/radio4/factual/unschooled.shtml Click here: BBC Radio 4 - Factual - Unschooled
messages.messageBody:
--- In AlwaysLearning@y..., atwttmab@a... wrote:
> For anyone who might be interested in the media perception of
HE in Britain.
> The interviews with 5 HE'd adults have clearly been 'spun', but
still make
> for interesting listening.
> Lyndax
> <A
HREF="http://www.bbc.co.uk/radio4/factual/unschooled.shtml">
Click here: BBC Radio 4 - Factual - Unschooled</A> <
> http://www.bbc.co.uk/radio4/factual/unschooled.shtml>


It's very obvious that this has been cut and edited to suit (you can
hear where it's been snipped!). The only man I heard
interviewed had some interesting things to say, but I only
listened to half of it.

Meghan

messages.subject: BBC Radio 4

messages.messageBody:
For anyone who might be interested in the media perception of HE in Britain.
The interviews with 5 HE'd adults have clearly been 'spun', but still make
for interesting listening.
Lyndax
<A HREF="http://www.bbc.co.uk/radio4/factual/unschooled.shtml">Click here: BBC Radio 4 - Factual - Unschooled</A> <
http://www.bbc.co.uk/radio4/factual/unschooled.shtml>
